TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImageUsageFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Bitmask specifying intended usage of an image

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags ColorAttachment = int32(16)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for use as a color or resolve attachment in a sname:VkFramebuffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags DepthStencilAttachment = int32(32)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for use as a depth/stencil attachment in a sname:VkFramebuffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags InputAttachment = int32(128)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for occupying sname:VkDescriptorSet slot of type ename:VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT; be read from a shader as an input attachment; and be used as an input attachment in a framebuffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags Sampled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for occupying a sname:VkDescriptorSet slot either of type ename:VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE or ename:VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER, and be sampled by a shader.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags Storage = int32(8)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for occupying a sname:VkDescriptorSet slot of type ename:VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags TransferDst = int32(2)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used as the destination of a transfer command.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags TransferSrc = int32(1)

Docs.summary: indicates that the image can: be used as the source of a transfer command.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.ImageUsageFlags TransientAttachment = int32(64)

Docs.summary: indicates that the memory bound to this image will have been allocated with the ename:VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT (see <<memory>> for more detail). This bit can: be set for any image that can: be used to create a sname:VkImageView suitable for use as a color, resolve, depth/stencil, or input attachment.
